Warehouse Keeper Holvas: When I hold these pages up to the light, I can see hidden words here Hmmm... These words are similar to the Kamael tongue, but they seem somehow older... Besides being written in a dead language, it also appears to be written in a code that I can't decipher... If you have studied under Kamael Grand Master Meldina in Giran Castle , you may be able to read it... Mmm... I will give you a copy of the code, just in case... In any event, thank you for your help.
